Name : Monjed Shakweh
Email : mshakweh@hotmail.com
Company : Pharma Gate
Telephone : +963992999401
Country : Syrian Arab Republic


Message : Dear Sir or Madam
We are a cosmetics and beauty products manufacturing company based in Aleppo, Syria.
We are seeking to import approximately 15 tons of Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate.
We would be grateful if you could provide us with a quote.
With my best regards.
Monjed Shakweh
